The PPlanter is a project of

Hyphae Design Lab

Hyphae Design Laboratory is a consulting, design and engineering firm dedicated to bridging the gap between innovative architecture and applied biological sciences. Our company strives to bring site specific, community & ecologically-driven solutions to urban infrastructure challenges.
